articles.title: Congratulatory message to General Secretary Kim Jong Il from President Jiang Zemin
articles.content:
Congratulatory message to General Secretary Kim Jong Il from President Jiang Zemin 
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) - The great leader comrade Kim Jong Il received a congratulatory message from Pres. Jiang Zemin, General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, on his election as General Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
   The message dated October 8 says:
   Upon hearing the happy news that you have been elected General Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, I sincerely extend warm congratulations to you on behalf of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and myself.
   Since comrade Kim Il Sung passed away three years ago, the people of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea have rallied closely around the WPK Central Committee under your leadership and carried out comrade Kim Il Sung's behests.
    With iron will and strong determination, the people of the DPRK have overcome all kinds of difficulties and hardships through their own efforts.
   The people of the DPRK have continued the successful march along the road of building their motherland, striving for the independent and peaceful reunification of the country and safeguarding peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula.
   China and the DPRK are friendly neighbors linked by common mountains and rivers. There exists a time-tested traditional friendship between the two parties, two countries and two peoples, which was personally fostered and developed by the leaders of older generation of our two countries.
   Defending and consolidating this traditional friendship and developing the Sino-DPRK friendly and cooperative ties are not only in the fundamental interests of the two parties, two countries and two peoples, but also of great significance for promoting peace, stability and development on the Korean Peninsula, in northeast Asia and even the whole world.
   We will, as always, make unremitting efforts to further strengthen and develop the Sino-DPRK friendly and cooperative relations.
   We believe that with our joint efforts, the Sino-DPRK traditional friendship and good-neighborly ties will surely be developed and passed on from generation to generation, providing welfare to our two peoples and contributing to peace, stability and development in Asia and the rest of the world.
   I wholeheartedly wish you and the WPK greater success in their future work of leading the Korean people.

articles.title: Floral baskets and congratulatory letters to General Secretary Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral baskets and congratulatory letters to General Secretary Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The great leader comrade Kim Jong Il received a floral basket and congratulatory letter from the diplomatic corps here on the 52nd anniversary of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea.
   They were handed to Vice-Premier and Foreign Minister Kim Yong Nam by Palestinian Ambassador to Korea Shaher Mohammed Abdlah on behalf of the corps on Oct. 8.
   Comrade Kim Jong Il also received floral baskets and congratulatory letters from the military attaches corps and economic and commercial councillors corps here in connection with his election as General Secretary of the WPK on Oct. 8.
   Yury Sibrjaev, Military Attache of the Russian Embassy here and also doyen of the corps, handed them to Jo Myong Rok, Director of the General Political Department of the Korean People's Army, and Chen Yufa, Economic and Commercial Councillor of the Chinese Embassy here and doyen of the corps, to an official concerned.
   Congratulatory letters to comrade Kim Jong Il from military attaches of Russian, Vietnamese, Egyptian, Peruvian and  Chinese embassies here were handed to the Director of the General Political Department of the KPA.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's election as WPK General Secretary welcomed abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's election as WPK General Secretary welcomed abroad
  Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- A National Organizing Committee of Uganda for Welcoming the Respected Comrade Kim Jong Il's Election as General Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea was formed in Kampala on Oct. 1 and a committee of the Communist Party of Malta for Welcoming his election, at the building of the Party Central Committee on Oct. 2.
  The deputy National Political Commissar of the Mass Mobilization Department of the Presidential Office of Uganda was elected Chairman of the Committee of Uganda and the Secretary General of the Maltese Party, Chairman of the Maltese Committee.

articles.title: Floral basket to General Secretary Kim Jong Il from Palestinian President
articles.content:
Floral basket to General Secretary Kim Jong Il from Palestinian President
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- A floral basket from Palestinian President Yasser Arafat came to the great leader comrade Kim Jong Il to mark the 52nd annviersary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
   The floral basket was handed to an official concerned by Palestinian Ambassador to Korea Shaher Mohammed Abdlah on Wednesday.

articles.title: South Korean reckless war manoeuvres
articles.content:
South Korean reckless war manoeuvres
Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The Kim Young Sam group recently made a very ill-boding military movement against the north.
   The south Korean puppet joint chiefs of staff headquarters on October 8 announced that they will stage a "joint air defense drill together with combined forces" to provide against the "aircraft infiltration from the north" in Seoul and its surroundings. 
   And a puppet army unit made a "discussion of operation and tactics in forefront areas" to "build postures for operation and maximize integral combatant capacity"  in order to cope with someone's "provocation" with the attendance of the commander of the third field army and other commanding officers. And the puppet army passed a large number of military vehicles and war suppliers through the outskirts of Seoul for a war exercise codenamed "twin dragon". Some time ago, the puppet joint chiefs of staff headquarters distributed to all units of the puppet army the plan for war preparation against the north in which the concrete contents are specified for a preemptive strike on the north in the event of "contingency", and the puppets committed provocations repeatedly along the Military Demarcation Line and war manoeuvers at the puppet army every day. This is a very ill-boding military movement. Such movement proves that the south Korean bellicose elements made the military adventure a fait accompli and are escalating the preparation.
   Their frantic war manoeuvres against the north are linked with their serious internal confusion.
   Now the Kim Young Sam group are uneasy and irritated by their unfavourable election situation owing to the withdrawal of members from the "New Korea Party" and the fall of Kim's image with the approach of the "Presidential Election" slated for the end of the year.  So Kim Young Sam is attempting to incite a war fever within the army on the pretext of the fictitious "provocation" of the north and let the "New Korea Party" remain in power for another term by creating uneasiness and fear among the people.
   The puppets are taking the road of military adventure for another term of office but this will only precipitate their ruin.
   The Korean people and People's Army are sharply watching every movement of the puppets and will mete out a thousandfold  punishment to them if they unleash war against the north.

articles.title: Floral basket to General Secretary Kim Jong Il from CPC Central Committee
articles.content:
Floral basket to General Secretary Kim Jong Il from CPC Central Committee
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The great leader comrade Kim Jong Il received a floral basket from the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China on his election as General Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
   It was handed to an official concerned by Chinese Ambassador to Korea Wan Yongxiang on Oct. 8.
   The ambassador said that the great leader comrade Kim Jong Il's election as Party General Secretary is happy news not only to the Korean Party and people but also to the Chinese Party and people.
   He noted that the news will give great encouragement to all the Chinese people and Party members.
   He expressed the belief that friendship between the two parties and the two countries, china and Korea, will be developed day by day under the concern and care of comrade Kim Jong Il.
   He said, "we extend warm congratulations to comrade Kim Jong Il once again on his election as Party General Secretary."

articles.title: Independence anniversary of Uganda commemorated
articles.content:
Independence anniversary of Uganda commemorated 
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held here on Wednesday to commemorate the 35th anniversary of the Independence of Uganda.
   Present at the meeting were Ri Jin Su,  Vice-Chairman of Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea and Chairman of the Korea-Uganda Friendship Association,  and members of the association and working people in the city.
   A speech was made and a message of greetings to the President of Uganda was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il, greatest man with rare clairvoyance
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il, greatest man with rare clairvoyance
Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Comrade Kim Jong Il is the greatest man in the world, who brought about the best days of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean revolution with rare clairvoyance.
   Rodong Sinmun stresses this in a signed article today.
   The journey of trials and glory made by the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean revolution over the 30 odd years is associated with the rare intelligence of the respected comrade Kim Jong Il, and the great achievements gained by the WPK are replete with his clairvoyance, the paper says, and continues:
   He with rare clairvoyance puts forward ideas and theories of inexhaustible viability, looking into the distant future of the Korean reovlution.
   He sets forth the far-reaching strategy and lines of the revolution. He also advances policies of socialist construction for the eternal prosperity of the country.
   In the 70s he instilled the concrete conception of communist society into the minds of the people and put forward a Party platform to build it. His clairvoyance is, indeed, rare.
   With his ideas and theories indicating the road ahead, the WPK can lead socialist construction to a victory without making a mistake in shaping policies and deviating from them and creditably build an ideal society of humankind on this land.
   He with rare clairvoyance puts forward a strategy to win one victory after another, basing himself on the correctest analysis of the fast-changing situation.
   His clairvoyance is so rare and scientific that he gains a correct knowledge of the trend of the complicated situation that other people cannot predict nor envisage, and loses no time to provide for it.
   The "pueblo" incident and the hard-fought struggle to check and frustrate "team spirit" joint military manoeuvres and "special nuclear inspection" racket brought his rare clairvoyance home to people.
   He with rare clairvoyance envisages in a scientific way the pressing issues of world politics.
   His estimates of the Vietnamese War, the Second Mideast War, the civil war in Cambodia, the gulf war and other events which have taken place since the 1960s are all correct.
   No doubt, the Korean people under the leadership of the far-sighted general Kim Jong Il will certainly win in their struggle to build a powerful country of Juche and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche in Korea.

articles.title: Foreigners visit different places
articles.content:
Foreigners visit different places
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The military attaches corps here visited the monument to Party foundation and the Party Founding Museum on October 8 to mark the 52nd anniversary of the foundation of the Workers' Party of Korea.
   Officials in charge of culture and friendship of foreign embassies here visited the International Friendship Exhibition.
   The guests went round with keen interests the gifts the great leaders President Kim Il Sung and comrade Kim Jong Il received from Party leaders and heads of state, political and public figures of foreign countries and international organisations.
   They also saw cultural relics on Mt. Myohyang.

articles.title: Friendship gathering with Mexican Party delegation
articles.content:
Friendship gathering with Mexican Party delegation
Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- A friendship gathering with the members of the visiting delegation of the Workers' Party of Mexico took place at Moranbong Senior Middle School No. 1 on October 8. 
   Present on invitation were the members of the delegation led by Maria Guadalupe Rodriguez, member of the National Executive Committee.
   Ryang Tal Ju, Chairman of the Korea-Latin America and Caribbean Regional Friendship Association and Vice-Chairman of the Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, officials concerned and teachers and pupils of the school were present.
   The participants went round the educational facilities of the school and appreciated an art performance of pupils.
   Then they deepened friendly feelings, conversing with each other.

articles.title: Papers hail Kim Jong Il's election as General Secretary of WPK
articles.content:
Papers hail Kim Jong Il's election as General Secretary of WPK 
Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Papers here today devote the first and second pages to a speical communique of the Workers' Party of Korea Central Committee and Central Military Commission on the great leader comrade Kim Jong Il's official election as General Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
   Printed at the top of the first pages of papers is a color portrait of comrade Kim Jong Il.
   Under the titles "historic event in development of our Party and revolution" and "iron will of people to make revolution to the end under leadership of the great general Kim Jong Il", rodong sinmun and minju joson round up words of people of all strata about  the special communique and carry news that the Korean people greeted the historic moment with a storm of cheers. 
   Under the banner titles "boundless pride of people who have the great comrade Kim Jong Il as Party General Secretary" and "highest glory to the great comrade Kim Jong Il, General Secretary of our Party" Rodong Sinmun and Minju Joson each devote one whole page to Gala events  held in Pyongyang and local areas on Wendesday evening to welcome his election as Party General Secretary.
   Under the title "great auspicious event for world progressive humankind, great honor of Korea"  Rodong Sinmun conveys news that committees for welcoming the respected comrade  Kim Jong Il's election as Party General Secretary were formed in different countries and rounds up words of foregin figures and mass media.

articles.title: Gala evening held to celebrate Kim Jong Il's election as WPK General Secretary
articles.content:
Gala evening held to celebrate Kim Jong Il's election as WPK General Secretary
  Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Gala meetings of youths and students in Pyongyang, officers and men of the three services of the Korean People's Army and public security men were held in different parts of the capital city  Wednesday evening to congratulate the great leader comrade Kim Jong Il upon his election as General Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
   Kim Il Sung Square, the venue of the gala evening of the youths and students in Pyongyang, was decorated beautifully.
   Seen on the buildings around the square were boards of "Long live general Kim Jong Il, the sun of the 21st century !", "The highest glory to the great leader comrade Kim Jong Il" and other slogans.
   "Let us sing of our pride of having the general," "Our general is best," "Thunder on Jong Il Peak" and other songs of praise and reverence for comrade Kim Jong Il were sung with group dance, acrobatic and other colorful art and sports numbers performed one after another.
   The participants in the evening danced full of vigor hand in hand with each other.
   They extended the highest glory to comrade Kim Jong Il, who has strengthened and developed the WPK into an invincible one and led the socialist cause of Juche to a victory.
   Overseas Koreans and foreigners joined the dancers.
   Seeing the evening were Ri Jong Ok, Pak Song Chol, Kim Yong Nam, Kye Ung Thae, Jo Pyong Ho, Jo Myong Rok, Yang Hyong Sop and other senior Party and state officials.
   The members of visiting foreign delegations and guests and foreign diplomatic envoys here were present on invitation.
   In Jonsung Square officers and men of the three services of the KPA danced to the tune of "Song of Three Prides," "My Country is Best"," "Company Life is Good" and other songs, with the flags of the Supreme Commander, the Party and the DPRK and red flags flying high at the centre.
   Acrobatic pieces were also performed by the acrobats of the People's Army.
   On the plaza in front of the Ponghwa Art Theatre public security men and soldiers of the Korean People's Security Forces danced to the tune of "Our Comrade Kim Jong Il," "One Large Family," "Song of Pleasant dance" and other songs.
   Gala events also  took place with large attendance of youths and students at provincial, city and county seats and complexes.

articles.title: Ryonhwa Joint Venture Company commissioned
articles.content:
Ryonhwa Joint Venture Company commissioned

   Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- A commissioning ceremony of the Ryonhwa Joint Venture Company was held on October 8.
   Associated with patriotism and loyalty of compatriots under the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), it will produce high quality clothes.
   Present at the ceremony were Kim Jong U, Vice-Chairman of the State External Economic Affairs Commission, officials concerned and employees.
   At the end of the ceremony the participants went round the production processes of the company.

articles.title: U.S and s. Korean authorities' arms buildup denounced
articles.content:
U.S and s. Korean authorities' arms buildup denounced
Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Revolutionary Communist Party of Great Britain (Marxism-Leninism) published a statement on September 30 denouncing the arms buildup of the United States and the south Korean authorities.
   The statement said that the large-scale arms buildup of the U.S government and the south Korean authorities is a reckless move against the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and part of premeditated war policy against the peace-loving Korean people.
   The point is that the arms buildup is being committed on the pretext of "defence" and is timed to coincide with the United States' call for "four-way talks" for peace on the Korean Peninsula, the statement said, and noted:
   The obvious double-dealing policy and threat and blackmail of the United States do not work on the DPRK and will not frighten the south Korean people who have been long subjected to the arms buildup and irregularities and corruption of the authorities.
   The working class and progressive forces of Britain should demand the British government oppose the arms buildup of the U.S. And the south Korean authorities and enforce a positive and independent policy favourable for peace on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Japan must apologize for and repent of its past crimes, says Japanese figure
articles.content:
Japan must apologize for and repent of its past crimes, says Japanese figure
Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Shizue Araya, leader of Japan's Denchishokyo, was interviewed by KCNA.
   She told KCNA: 
   "We repented of the  crimes Japan committed against the Korean people. We also  met with former "Comfort Women for the Japanese Army" and heard  their testimonies. Through their remarks we felt how big the crimes of our ancestors are and how big the bruises in Korean women's minds are  and we feel ashamed of it."
   "We met with Japanese women who live in the DPRK and could know of  their happy life. Seeing them live full of joy under the care of general Kim Jong Il, we extended thanks to him."
   "Japan must have the courage to apologize for and repent of  its past crimes."
  "We will devote our efforts, though slight, to the reunification of Korea, the desire of the Korean people."

articles.title: Proposal for reunification by confederacy formula, reunification programme common to nation
articles.content:
Proposal for reunification by confederacy formula, reunification programme common to nation
Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The proposal for founding the Democratic Confederal Republic of Koryo advanced by the great leader President Kim Il Sung is the most fair and aboveboard and realistic reunification programme common to the nation, which gives answers to all the questions arising in building and managing a unified state.
    Rodong Sinmun today stresses this in a by-lined article dedicated to the seventeenth anniversary of the publication of the proposal for reunification by confederacy formula.
   The DCRK founding proposal is based on the specific conditions of divided Korea. It is stipulated in the proposal that the country should be reunified by founding a confederal state through the establishment of a unified national government on condition that the north and the south recognize and tolerate each other's ideas and social systems, a government in which the two sides are represented on an equal footing and under which they exercise regional autonomy respectively with equal rights and duties.
   The paper further says:
   In view of the urgent demand of the Korean nation and of the specific conditions of the country the best way of achieving the reunification of the country at an early date is to build a unified national state through confederacy based on one nation, one state, two systems and two governments.
   The DCRK founding proposal is the way of reunifying the country on the principle of placing the nation above the differences in ideology  and social system and subordinating everything  to the highest interests of the nation. It is the most realistic, reasonable and fair and aboveboard reunification proposal which makes it possible to reunify the country without seeking one side's superiority and interests and without doing harm to either side, now that different ideologies and systems exist  in the north and south of Korea.
   The country should be reunified by founding the DCRK. 
Only then can the Korean nation establish sovereignty over the whole of Korea, achieve great unity as a homogeneous nation, demonstrate the proud appearance of the nation of the same blood and build a unified national state, independent, peaceloving and neutral, in Korea.

articles.title: Korea's honor of having Kim Jong Il as WPK General Secretary
articles.content:
Korea's honor of having Kim Jong Il as WPK General Secretary 
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- A special communique of the Workers' Party of Korea Central Committee and Central Military Commission on the great leader comrade Kim Jong Il's official election as Party General Secretary has caused a great sensation among people of all strata.
   Yon Hyong Muk, Chief Secretary of the Jagang Provincial Party Committee, said, "with the great comrade Kim Jong Il, the experienced and tested leader and political leader of socialism enjoying reverence and trust from the whole world, elected as Party General Secretary, our Party will demonstrate its dignity as an eternal revolutionary Party of Juche, lead the Korean revolution to victory and guide the cause of independence for the working people in the van of the era."
   "Comrade Kim Jong Il's election as Party General Secretary is the privilege and great fortune for our Party, motherland and people," he noted.
   He said he will hold comrade Kim Jong Il in high esteem at the head of the Party forever, share weal and woe with him in any adversity and remain loyal to his leadership to the end.
   Jang chol, Vice-Premier of the Administration Council, said that the respected comrade Kim Jong Il is the greatest man who leads the Korean nation and humankind. He said he could not express his pleasure and emotion  enough at comrade Kim Jong Il's  election as the General Secretary of the Party.
   "With comrade Kim Jong Il at the head of the Party,  our fatherland will be a more powerful country of Juche and our nation will demonstrate their dignity and honor as Kim Il Sung's  nation forever," Jang said.
   Vice Marshal of the Korean People's Army  Kim Ik Hyon, an anti-Japanese revolutionary fighter, said, "the great comrade Kim Jong Il is our future and the glory and happiness of Kim Il Sung's  Korea."
   He noted that he is proud of the Korean people who are blessed with wise leaders and famous generals.
   As a member of the first generation of revolution and a veteran Party official, he called for trusting and following the great General Secretary under any conditions and vigorously advancing along the road of revolution to the end.

articles.title: 52nd WPK foundation anniversary observed in Pyongyang
articles.content:
52nd WPK foundation anniversary observed in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place with large attendance at the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium to celebrate the 52nd founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
   Attending the meeting were Ri Jong Ok, Pak Song Chol and other senior Party and state officials.
   The meeting place was filled with the highest honor and national pride of having the great leader comrade Kim Jong Il as WPK General Secretary.
   Secretary Kim Ki Nam of the WPK Central Committee made a report.
    The reporter at first sincerely extended the greatest glory and warmest congratulations to comrade Kim Jong Il on his election as WPK General Secretary, representing the hearts of unbounded loyalty of all the Party members, officers and men of the People's Army and other people.
   He said over the past 50 odd years the WPK under the guidance of the great leader comrade Kim Il Sung and the respected comrade Kim Jong Il victoriously led the cause of independence of the popular masses by pushing ahead with the revolution and construction, opening a new history of the revolutionary Party in the era of independence and pulling through manifold difficulties.
   Comrade Kim Il Sung always successfully applied the Juche idea and line of building a Juche-based Party in founding and leading the WPK, thus performing undying precious feats and accumulating rich and diverse experience in Party work and activities, he said, and continued:
   "While leading the WPK, comrade Kim Il Sung built the Party, looking into the distant future with his rare clairvoyance and successfully solved the question of inheriting the leadership in order to strengthen and develop the WPK into a revolutionary Party of Juche forever and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche."
   "The WPK has always maintained the idea and line of building a Juche-based Party and embodied them in an all-round way, thereby effecting a new upsurge in its development. This is attributable to the never-ceasing thinking and unremitting efforts of comrade Kim Jong Il, who  has  long since developed in depth the cause of a Juche-based Party building, true to the lofty intention of comrade Kim Il Sung."
   "In accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche comrade Kim Jong Il has always led the Party as desired by comrade Kim Il Sung as his closest revolutionary comrade and most faithful helper. He creditably exalted the guiding idea of the WPK as the imperishable revolutionary banner in the era of independence and brought radical innovation and changes in Party building and activities."
   "While leading the Party work and activities, he was highly praised and respected by all people as a great thinker and theoretician, a genius of creation and construction and the tender-hearted father of the people."
   "He is a great communist revolutionary who distinguished himself in showing infinite loyalty and moral obligation to the leader, the pioneer of the revolution, and his cause."
   "He, standing in the van of all-Party, all-people general march of socialism, pulled through all difficulties singlehandedly and led the Party, the army and the people to victory with his energetic activities so that the Korean revolution has entered a new phase of change."
   "We should uphold the guidance of comrade Kim Jong Il. Only then can we hold comrade Kim Il Sung in high esteem as the eternal leader, strengthen and develop the WPK into the revolutionary Party of Juche forever and advance the Korean revolution along the road of independence and complete it as comrade Kim Il Sung wished."
   "We will, as ever, hold in high esteem comrade Kim Il Sung as the eternal leader of our Party and revolution, exalt the brilliance of his revolutionary life and undying feats generation after generation and successfully accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche under the guidance of comrade Kim Jong Il, a cause which started on mt. Paektu."
   "The Korean revolution, which advances  along the road of Juche  with comrade Kim Jong Il as General Secretary of the WPK, will win the final victory without fail, pulling through all kinds of difficulties."

articles.title: Korea filled with joy at Kim Jong Il's election as WPK General Secretary
articles.content:
Korea filled with joy at Kim Jong Il's election as WPK General Secretary
  Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- A special communique of the Workers' Party of Korea Central Committee and Central Military Commission declaring the  great leader comrade Kim Jong Il was elected WPK General Secretary has caused a big sensation among the Korean people.
   The atmosphere of festivity which had continued more than half a month  since Sep. 22 with news of the recommendation of comrade Kim Jong Il as WPK General Secretary reached the climax at five p.m. Yesterday when the special communique was made public.
   Now that the long-awaited day came and their ardent desire was realised, all the people throughout the country turned out to dance and sing songs of best wishes and 
Loyalty.
   Last evening, all the places of the country, including Kim Il Sung Square in the capital city of Pyongyang, had gala meetings. Today broad segments of people in holiday dress are dancing in the streets and villages all day long. 
Among the dancing people are anti-Japanese veterans, war veterans, kindergarteners and housewives. Their faces are bright with great pride and joy at the fact that their desire has been realised.
   "Song of General Kim Jong Il", "No motherland without you" "We  believe in you as in heaven" and other songs were sung from the singing squads of schoolchildren, brass bands and loudspeaker cars in the streets."
   Wallpapers telling of the great event of the nation are seen in the streets, villages, factories, enterprises and institutions.
   Seen everywhere are boards of "The highest glory to the great leader comrade Kim Jong Il who was elected as General Secretary of our Party"," "Long live general Kim Jong Il, the sun of the 21st century," "Let us defend the headquarters of the revolution headed by comrade Kim Jong Il with our lives !." and other slogans and the flags of the Party and the DPRK fluttering high.
   Pyongyang-based mass media report about impressive news as regards the election of comrade Kim Jong Il as WPK General Secretary as well as words of the Korean people expressing their firm determination to work hard for the eternal prosperity of the country with the pride of having the great general Kim Jong Il as Party chief.
   All the papers here today frontpage a color portrait of comrade Kim Jong Il for the first time.
   The progressives of the world rejoice as over their own over the great event of the Korean people.
   General Secretary Jiang Zemin of the Communist Party of China Central Committee in a message  extended warm congratulations to comrade Kim Jong Il on behalf of the CPC Central Committee and himself.
   Messages of greetings are coming to comrade Kim Jong Il from foreign Party leaders and many prominent public figures, and news media of many countries give wide publicity to the special communique.
